about_the_game:
(Please click discord invitation link on the right side -->)

Many years later, the effects of global warming and radioactive contamination leaks have culminated in the world we see today: killing frenzy sea monsters, sunken city, massive population shrinking etc. The world is now covered by hopeless sea, so brace yourself captain, bring your courage and last hope of humankind and set sail!

What emerges from the sea remains unpredictable, so prepare to face procedurally generated monster squads, thus each run is unique! Slay hordes of monsters before they halt your progress.

Choose commander and hull, upgrade traits with your choices. But look, diamonds are dropping! They are awards for eliminating enemies. Collect them and exchange for weapons, upgrades and more at blackmarket.

Defeat bosses and find out the story behind. Elite enemies will show no mercy to those weakened; any mistake you make may lead to Perma Death. So, stay curious, but most importantly, stay cautious.

If you fail, most unfortunately, you will lose all your progress. Yet don't panic at all, all the resources you've collected this run will be automatically used for unlocking new ships from the shipyard. Each time you die, you die with honor. Pick your favorite ship, wield your favorite weapon, and get ready to smash through the sea in this bloodshed.

Hopefully, you will manage to escape from this Hopeless Sea!

name: Hopeless Sea

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 128 MB available space

short_description: Hopeless Sea is a roguelike, arcade-inspired, top-down shooter. You pilot a ship to cut your way through hordes of procedurally generated, merciless sea monsters. Choose wisely from a variety of ships, weapons and upgrades since conquering this hopeless sea is the only way to survive.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
